The user converts their chakra into an extremely sticky oil and spits it out as a huge mass or as a barrage of small bullets. Those caught by it will find it difficult to move, and simply washing the oil away with regular water won't be easy. Furthermore, if a [[Fire Release]] technique is launched at the target after this technique is used, they will be enveloped in flames in an instant.
